SEARCH
Package cycling

Class Checkpoint

java.lang.Object
cycling.Checkpoint
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MountainCheckpoint, SprintCheckpoint
public abstract class Checkpoint extends Object implements Serializable
Checkpoint holds information regarding a checkpoint, it is an abstract unimplemented class
See Also:

      public abstract CheckpointType getType()
      Gets the type of a checkpoint: The category of the climb - CheckpointType.C4, CheckpointType.C3, CheckpointType.C2, CheckpointType.C1, CheckpointType.HC or CheckpointType.SPRINT
      Returns:
      The type of this checkpoint

      time - The time that they pased this checkpoint
